alert.note: Alert for Madison (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 9:16PM CDT until May 11 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. Mississippi River at Clarksville. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Chester. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flood Stage. Minor flooding begins to occur at this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Monday was 22.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 17.4 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Mel Price LD 21.0 21.3 20.5 19.8 19.0 18.3 17.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
